      Sets the client application name.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withConnectionMaxIdle​(Duration connectionMaxIdle)
      Sets the maximum amount of time that an idle connection may sit in the connection pool and still be eligible for reuse.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withConnectionTimeout​(Duration connectionTimeout)
      Sets the connection timeout on the underlying HTTP client.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withIgnoreTls​(boolean ignoreTls)
      Sets the switch to ignore HTTPS verification errors.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withMaxConnections​(int maxConnections)
      Sets the maximum number of allowed open HTTP connections.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withProxyPassword​(String proxyPassword)
      Sets the value of the proxy password.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withProxyUri​(String proxyUri)
      Sets the value of the proxy URI.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withProxyUsername​(String proxyUsername)
      Sets the value of the proxy username.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withReadTimeout​(Duration readTimeout)
      Sets the read timeout on the underlying HTTP client.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withRequestHeaders​(Map<String,​String> requestHeaders)
      Sets the request headers.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withRetryHandler​(RetryHandler retryHandler)
      Sets the value for RetryHandler.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withTrustedCertificates​(List<X509Certificate> trustedCertificates)
      Sets the trusted certificates.
      CdpClientConfigurationBuilder CdpClientConfigurationBuilder.withValidateAfterInactivity​(Duration validateAfterInactivity)
      Sets the amount of time that a connection can be idle in the connection pool before it must be validated to ensure it's still open.
